Pre-Game Insights: Dallas Mavericks will host Indiana Pacers in a non-conference game on November 5, 2024.
Dallas Mavericks had a 50-32 overall record last season and a 25-16 record at home.
Indiana Pacers had a 47-35 overall record last season and a 21-20 record on the road.
Dallas Mavericks averaged 6.9 steals, 5.0 blocks, and 12.1 turnovers per game last season.
Indiana Pacers averaged 123.3 points per game last season, with 16.1 points from the free-throw line and 39.6 points from deep.
Injuries for the Mavericks include Dante Exum (out with wrist injury) and Maxi Kleber (day to day with hamstring injury).

Injuries for the Pacers include Aaron Nesmith (day to day with ankle injury), Isaiah Jackson (out with calf injury), Andrew Nembhard (day to day with knee injury), and James Wiseman (out with calf injury).
